sentences.sContent: I did some work as a nude model when I was in college.
sentences.sCn: 我上大学的时候当过裸体模特。

sentences.sContent: Have you ever posed nude (= been photographed or painted while nude )?

synos.tran: 裸的，裸体的；无装饰的；与生俱有的

phrases.pCn: n. [医]裸鼠；裸小鼠；无毛鼠（指实验室中饲养的老鼠）

words.tran: 裸体主义的；裸体主义者的

trans.tranCn: 裸的，裸体的；无装饰的；与生俱有的

trans.tranOther: a painting, statue etc of someone not wearing clothes
